```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyboot)
library(jsonlite)
library(rwebppl)
library(coda)
library(ggthemes)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggpubr)

estimate_mode <- function(s) {
  d <- density(s)
  return(d$x[which.max(d$y)])
}


hdi_upper<- function(s){
  m <- HPDinterval(mcmc(s))
  return(m["var1","upper"])
}

hdi_lower<- function(s){
  m <- HPDinterval(mcmc(s))
  return(m["var1","lower"])
}


```

# Model 

## model output
```{r}
model <- bind_rows(
  read_csv("../model/output/model-50000_burn25000_lag5_chain1.csv")%>%mutate(chain = 1),
  read_csv("../model/output/model-50000_burn25000_lag5_chain2.csv")%>%mutate(chain = 2)
  )
```

```{r}
model <- model%>%
  select(-f, -e)%>%
  rename(paramter = a, 
         type = b,
         id = c,
         value = d
         )%>%
  mutate(chain = factor(chain))
```

## Visualize paramters

### Semantic Knowledge

```{r}

item_params <- model %>%
  filter(paramter == "items")

item_summary <- item_params %>%
  group_by(chain, id, type)%>%
  summarise(mode = estimate_mode(value),
            uci = hdi_upper(value),
            lci = hdi_lower(value))

sem_know_map <- item_summary%>%
  select(-uci,-lci)%>%
  spread(type, -chain) %>%
  expand_grid(., age = unique(data$c_age)) %>%
  mutate(sem_know = plogis(intercept + slope * age))

ggarrange(
  
ggplot(item_params, aes(x = value, col = id, fill=id, group = chain))+
  geom_density(alpha = 0.3, aes(lty = chain))+
  xlab("Speaker Optimality Parameter")+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_color_viridis_d()+
  scale_fill_viridis_d()+
  guides(col = F, fill = F, lty = F)+
  facet_grid(id ~type)
,

ggplot(data = sem_know_map, aes(x = age+2, y= sem_know, col = id))+
  geom_line( aes(lty = chain),size = 1)+
  ylab("Semantic knowledge")+
  xlab("Age")+
  ylim(0,1)+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_colour_viridis_d(name = "Object")

)
```


### Speaker Optimality

```{r}
so_id <- model %>%
  filter(paramter == "speaker_optimality")

so_id_summary <- so_id %>%
  group_by(chain, id)%>%
  summarise(mode = estimate_mode(value),
            uci = hdi_upper(value),
            lci = hdi_lower(value))

getPalette = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(9, "Set1"))
colourCount = length(unique(data$id))

ggarrange(

ggplot(so_id, aes(x = value, col = id, fill=id))+
  geom_density(alpha = 0.3, aes(lty = chain))+
  xlab("Speaker Optimality Parameter")+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_color_manual(values = getPalette(colourCount))+
  scale_fill_manual(values = getPalette(colourCount))+
  guides(col = F, fill = F)+
  facet_wrap(~id)

,

ggplot(so_id_summary, aes(x = id, y = mode, col = id, fill=id))+
  geom_pointrange(aes(ymin = lci, ymax = uci, pch = chain))+
  ylab("Speaker Optimality Parameter")+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_color_manual(values = getPalette(colourCount))+
  scale_fill_manual(values = getPalette(colourCount))+
  guides(col = F, fill = F, lty = F)
  #ylim(0,5)
)
```
